BackstoryDef.title: maid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was designed to in the form of a victorian era maid, as seen from the distorted expectations of millenia later. [PAWN_pronoun] was expected to handle cooking, cleaning, gardening, caretaking, and the thousands of other tasks required to maintain a large estate.

BackstoryDef.title: tutor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a high end android available for purchase on an advanced glitterworld. [PAWN_possessive] advertised features included deep knowledge in a wide range of subject, proper etiquette, and the capability to use violence to defend [PAWN_possessive] charges.
